name: TIME (itch) (Techcrafter)
description:
TIME is a free and open source puzzle game, which consists of several real world images combined into an amazing puzzle experience. Explore various places, find hidden objects, open new paths and solve the puzzle of TIME!

For more detailed information about TIME, please read the Instructions And Documentation.

On some platforms you might need to install OpenJDK 17 to play this game! This is not required for the linux-amd64 build, as it already comes bundled with a portable version.

The source code for TIME can be found on GitHub.
